entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracing configuration similar to MetricsBuilder #99180
  • AttributeCollection[Type type] uses a static lock #99178
  • [wasm] Unable to use Emscripten ports not in cache #99176
  • Deduplicate cgroup code #99171
  • Need to delay type loading error until runtime for array of T with ByRefLike type #99165
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Garbage collector metrics #99164
  • ASSERT [THREAD ] at /__w/1/s/src/coreclr/pal/src/include/pal/utils.h.36: Expression: result >= val #99163
  • [mono] Intrinsify API's in SpanHelpers.ByteMemOps.cs #99161
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Publish `wasmbrowser` app from Visual Studio doesn't respect "include RID in output path" #99159
    9.0.0
  • Getting .net framework error when starting ADFS management console #99155
  • [API Proposal]: Additional setting for AsyncLocal Value to cascade upwards #99153
  • Can cross-platform cross-compilation be achieved in .net9.0 #99152
  • Segmentation Fault in libcoreclr Since .Net 8 Upgrade #99151
  • clang crashing on osx #99150
  • MethodBase.GetParameters() is not thread-safe #99147
  • Double.TryParse calculation result accuracy error in asp.net #99145
  • Remove a number of calls to `Unsafe.AsPointer` #99144
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadsClosedFinishes_ConnectionClose CI test failure #99142
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_GetCounters #99135
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in Interop workitem: Assert failure !"About to FailFast. set DOTNET_AssertOnFailFast=0 if this is expected" #99133
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT][osx-arm64] Crash when loading shared library as an LLDB plugin #99172
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 27 Regressions on 1/11/2024 10:37:40 PM #97093
    9.0.0
  • Unable to build on Linux #99149
  • Microsoft.DotNet.CodeAnalysis.dll depends on newer assemblies than the compiler provides #99141
    9.0.0
  • Workloads-NoWebcil-Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.DebugLevelTests timeout #98734
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threadin SignalR in Blazor WBT #97085
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24123.6] Windows SDK thrown "Non-blittable generic types cannot be marshaled" exception. #98977
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/Swift/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling.cmd #99090
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use VN instead of GenTree in optGlobalAssertionIsEqualOrNotEqual #99182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() should respect [ActivatorUtilitiesConstructor] #99175
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add more RuntimeTestMode options for the XUnitWrapperGenerator #99174
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable optimizations for b425314.dll test #99170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #99169
    area-Meta
  • Remove use of POH for cryptographic primitives #99168
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Bump _WIN32_WINNT to align with coreclr #99160
    area-Build-mono
  • SPMI: Expand PerfScore output #99158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude win_aot JIT binaries from Crossgen2 packages #99157
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] OSR: Fix initReg usage in genPushCalleeSavedRegisters #99156
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Support subtraction in scalar evolution #99154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove or document Unsafe.AsPointer uses in System.Memory #99146
    area-System.Memory
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GC hole in Guid #99138
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-reliability
  • Delete stackwalk cache #99137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • List exact regs killed by ByRefWriteBarrier on AMD64 #99134
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • ARM64: Use SIMD to copy nongc gaps in blocks with gc pointers #99140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nativeaot] Disable FEATURE_READOLY_GS_COOKIE on macOS #99173
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Block things needing align8 from preinitializing #99104
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove old fgRemoveRefPred #99099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve isinst expansion #99162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support loading Swift self register from SwiftSelf struct #99132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove IDE0060 suppressions #99113
    area-System.Memory
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Remove unnecessary heapifying in `PriorityQueue.EnqueueRange` #99139
    area-System.Collections
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Generalize strategy for finding addrecs #99048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Intrinsify SpanHelpers Clear/Fill #99115
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Strip unused generic type context for VASigCookie #99026
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Do not compare Span<T> with 'default' #99095
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Add missing GT_SWIFT_ERROR case to GenTree:TryGetUse #99120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove most fgGetPredForBlock calls #99118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Read/Write Async test #98432
    area-System.Threading
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BX_2A` and `SVE_BY_2A` #99087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Cleanup comments and ifdefs around this_OFFSET_FLAG #99092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Make the dedup mode output deterministic. #99128
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Liveness and UpperVector Save/Restore #99093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Improve alternation switch optimization in regex source generator #98723
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Add test case for interfaces without impls for whole hierarchy #98540
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix exception callstack showing incorrect line number #98953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • CoreCLR NativeAOT - ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reapply revert of https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/97227, fix Lock's waiter duration computation #98876
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_BV_2A #99049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Test on CI #99042
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Remove RuntimeIdentifiers from Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj #98956
    area-Setup
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass in the managed type system #98831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reuse x86 GC and unwinding code in NativeAOT #99109
    arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix FormatQuantiles formatting in MetricsEventSource #99045
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Memoize some CngKey standard properties #99053
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Avoid a crash if a method's signature cannot be loaded. #98997
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RuntimeFrameworkVersion partially ignored #39151
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.SDK Has reference to non existent Target #39148
  • Improve helix test execution to not flag failures with non-zero exit code #39147
  • MSBuild 17.9.4 no longer reports code style errors in build #39142
  • [Hot Reload] Enable hot reloading for Blazor inside an iframe #39137

Closed

  • error NETSDK1094 when using PublishReadyToRun to publish a library #39141
  • SDK should detect, respect and propagate System/User Locale settings #39133
  • Can`s pair to mac from windows #38941

PullRequests

Created

  • Use unique names for aliasing test packages #39144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39112
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Application-Insights to 2.22 #38638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Remove the System.Drawing.Common dependency #39108
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Field and value as contextual keywords #7964

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow inserting FQN instead of importing namespace on completion #72363
  • Cloning a .NET 8 record deriving from a .NET 7 record leads to loss of members #72357
  • [Question] How to use functionality from nuget packages in project referenced source generator #72356
  • Improve error recovery on missing type or identifier for property declaration #72354
    Backlog

Closed

  • [VB] `CInt(Math.Round(doubleValue, MidPointRounding.AwayFromZero))` and `CInt` for rounding methods for `Decimal` are not optimized #71819

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge the finally block during data flow analysis #72361
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Roslyn non-source-only build fixes #72360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update VS SDK to 17.10.22-preview-1 #72359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in InputNodes by specifying initial capacity #72358
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update PublishData for VS 17.10P2 snap #72351
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify IStreamingFindUsagesPresenter.StartSearch API #72343
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in NodeStateTable.GetPackedState #72355
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Small optimization around ProjectState modification operations #72313
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable CodeQL in unofficial builds #72302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72342
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72349
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address timing issue recently in CreateCompilationTrackerMap #72350
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153

Updated

  • Razor internals #71762
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Find usage message severity #72326
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix compiler vsix deployment #72321
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Support parsing for `allows` constraint #72346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Defer array creation in ConcurrentCache. #72291
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check PublishData.json feeds #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Explicitly use dotnet pwsh in scripts #72341
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support for features in Copilot Chat #72097
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #72257
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a simple way to disable interactive UI elements during prerendering and then enable them once interactivity is ready #54308
  • .NET 8 Blazor (Server with new template) - Issue with WS-Federation ChallengeAsync throwing a runtime exception #54305
  • Perf regression: json #54304
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #54303
  • VS 2022 17.10.0 Preview 1 - ClaimsPrincipal FindFirst method always returns null #54302
  • AuthorizeView tag with Roles attribute not working, always showing NotAuthorized content #54301
  • Blazor Server .NET 8 SEO Problem head tags #54300
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Cannot Set CloseOnAuthenticationExpiration With Global Interactive Rendering / InteractiveServerRenderMode #54296
  • Excessive memory usage with MapControllerRoute or MapDynamicControllerRoute #54295
  • SPA proxy development server launch options #54289
  • Hosted Blazor Web App throws error when opening (invalid cache?) #54285
  • Vulnerability on mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:6.0 image (Digest:sha256:894c9f49ae9a72b64e61ef6071a33b6b616d0cf48ef25c83c4cf26d185f37565) #54283
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #54281
  • CancellationToken not working with a timeout on blazor #54280

Closed

  • TryParse parameter binding breaks if IParsable is explicitly implemented #43546
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor static assets not found (404) when environment is non-Development #54291
  • RequestDelegateGenerator creates incorrect code with default parameters for bool and CancellationToken in Lambda expressions (AOT) #51183
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #54269
  • Perf regression: mapaction #54282
  • Identity for SPA isn't usable and production ready. The confirmation email and reset password aren't configurable enough to be used in production. #54284
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #54185
  • [Blazor WebApp] RenderMode InteractiveAuto and Could not reconnect to the server message #53120
  • httpContext.SignInAsync not working after update to .NET 8.0.2 #54075
  • Razor StreamRendering bug with server side project #53936
  • Non-fixed CascadingParameters cause out-of-order calls to "SetParametersAsync" #54100

PullRequests

Created

  • Prefer keys old enough to have propagated #54309
    area-dataprotection
  • Ensure key creation time is no later than key activation time #54299
    area-dataprotection
  • Match arguments and property names in UserLoginInfo #54298
    area-identity
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `e4fdb87` #54288
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `e4fdb87` #54287
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `e4fdb87` #54286
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] InputBase - SetCurrentValueAsync + SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync (fix for #44105) #54279
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update ReportDiff to add a Content-Type header #54307
    area-networking
  • Update Selenium #54292
    area-infrastructure
  • Sync shared code from runtime #54306
    area-runtime
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview3
  • Move computation of ShouldGenerateNewKey to KeyRingProvider #54264
    area-dataprotection
  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #54258
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9d43b27` to `e4fdb87` #54290
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #54266
    area-dataprotection, Servicing-approved
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24126.2 #54221
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] Update Nuget dependencies #54142
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Fix DefaultProblemDetailsWriter doesn't handle media type subsets #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HorizontalOption End does not work on a HorizontalStackedLayout on both Android and iOS #20952
  • on iOS, a control derived from Entry does not display the same of Entry #20951
  • Add a cancel event and/or command to the MAUI SearchBar control #20946
  • Hot Reload Button issue #20945
  • <Border /> property is not working while I write <Label /> property and passing a Text="", text is not being shown in the android emulator. #20944
  • Border does not resize correctly (android) #20943
  • Grid.Add() with no column information causes views to overlap/Horizontal layout semantics #20941
  • SwipeView does not animate correctly if there is no BackgroundColor in the #20939
  • Using MAUI: Touch regions are rendered as a box in an AbsoluteLayout. #20938

Closed

  • Implementation of multiple stack layout issue in dotnet 8 LTS MAUI #20947
  • Bugs in catching error. #20948
  • How to make animation rate smooth #12385
    Backlog
  • FFImageLoading CacheImage cause to crash app on IOS #20937
  • MtouchInterpreter doesn't seem to exclude dlls listed #20932
  • Windows .NET MAUI App throws Exception when closing second window #17909

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix image loading tests #20955
  • [Windows] Add scrolling tests for virtualization w/ Datatemplates #20954
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix image button scaling #20949
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Merge net9.0 to 9.0.100-preview2 #20942
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Maps Project API Docs #20893
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺
  • Improve WebAuthenticator API docs with exceptions #20860
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20935
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #20936
  • [ci] Enable 1ES PT #20728
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • Clear logcat and set to a larger size #20732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer return actual detected directions #20619
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-checkbox
  • [WIP] Testing timeouts for iOS device tests #20843
    do-not-merge
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area/Xaml </>
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating back #20420
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, area/gestures
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 9.0 API Reviews #33220
    9.0.0
  • Why does migration need singleton lifetime when AddDbContext and AddHostedService exist in ConfigurationServices? #33219
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore 8.0.2: Inferring type mapping based on operand size has caused regression for the Oracle EF core provider #33218
  • How to include children on another children condition #33217
  • KeyNotFoundException during ApplyProjection phase of a groupby query with FirstOrDefault #33216
  • We don't know how to bind property to OPENJSON subquery in some scenarios #33215
  • LINQ query is failing in VB.NET same query works with same EF in C# #33214

Closed

  • How does translation of comparison operators work for converted values? #33208
  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of Type "". In .Net 8 with EF Core 8 #33187
  • RelationalDbContextOptionsBuilder.CommandTimeout should accept zero as a valid value #33196
    9.0.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • API review changes #33221
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32911 - Incorrect apply projection for complex properties #33212
  • [release/8.0] Reduce memory usage during relationship cycle detection by keeping track of visited properties whenever there are FK forks #33211
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • Fix inferred mapping application on Sqlite JsonEachExpression #33209
  • Another tiny fix to #32911 #33213
  • 33196 command timeout allow zero #33198
    community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • .NET 9 Preview 1 MAUI baseline manifests need to be updated. #17897

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor ArtifactsSizeTest to emit updated baseline with only breaking size changes #18844
  • Pass TargetRid to Razor's build for the VMR #18843
  • Add product rid to ILCompiler rids when bundling ILCompiler with the SDK. #18835

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary runtime installation #18841
  • Rename prep.sh to indicate that it is source-build specific and move to the eng dir #18840
  • Invert smoke test publish complex logic #18842
  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #18806

Updated

  • Binary tooling #18726
  • Add SdkArchiveDiff task to verify the sdk archive has all the expected files #18748
  • Installer updates (Merge to SDK Changeset) #17959
  • Enable parallel builds across repos of VMR #18824
